tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_usage_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    electricity_usage DECIMAL,
    water_usage DECIMAL,
    gas_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE rooms (
    room_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    house_section VARCHAR(50),
    has_windows BOOLEAN,
    has_thermostat BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE RoomEnergyUsageReport (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR,
    energy_usage DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE RoomDetails (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR,
    room_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyOptimizationSuggestions (
    suggestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    suggestion_text VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE EnergySavings (
    room_id INT,
    saving_amount DECIMAL
)
CREATE TABLE Room (room_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, house_id INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE EnergyUsage (usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_id INT NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL, energy_consumed DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE EnergyCost (cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_id INT NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL, cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE RoomTemperature (temp_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_id INT NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL, temperature DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE RoomOccupancy (occupancy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_id INT NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL, occupants INT NOT NULL);
